title: シンプルAIデモ: スマートアシスタント
concept_overview: A sleek, modern commercial showcasing an AI assistant helping with everyday tasks. The video demonstrates simplicity, efficiency, and human-AI collaboration through clean visuals and smooth transitions.

scenes.description: Opening shot: Modern, minimalist home office with a person at a clean desk. Soft morning light streams through a window. The person looks slightly overwhelmed with papers and a laptop.
scenes.camera_movement: Slow zoom in from wide shot to medium shot

scenes.description: The person speaks to their device (smartphone or smart speaker). A subtle glow or visual effect indicates AI activation. Clean UI elements appear floating in the air or on screen.
visual_elements: Smartphone or smart speaker with subtle glow
scenes.camera_movement: Close-up on device, then pull back to show person

scenes.description: Quick montage: AI assistant organizing calendar, sending emails, setting reminders. Visual representations of tasks being completed automatically with smooth animations.
visual_elements: Email interface with messages being drafted
scenes.camera_movement: Quick cuts between different digital interfaces

scenes.description: Return to the person who now looks relaxed and satisfied. The desk is organized, tasks are complete. They smile with relief and confidence.
scenes.camera_movement: Medium shot of person, slight tilt up for positive feel

scenes.description: Logo reveal with tagline. Clean, modern branding appears with subtle animation. Background fades to clean white or gradient.
scenes.camera_movement: Static shot, focus on logo and text
